analysis.description:

	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol#484-490)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol#496-502)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol#507-513)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol#519-523)

TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol#856-866) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0x69c68eaf0a942097e3cf59999b9121e7f99cad44.sol)
